EndConvBlocker is a mix-in class whose sole function is to define the blockEndConv method common to Actor, ActorState and NodeEndCheck **`EndConvBlocker`**` :   object`

blockEndConv ( )

actor.t[4883]

Convenience method that notes that conversation has occurred on this turn and returns nil. This is to allow us to use: \*. return blockEndConv; in the canEndConversation method to suppress the output of any
